task.title: Delete an Existing General Comment for an Activity

step.cmd: Select the tab that includes the activity for which you want to delete an existing general comment.
Select , and then select Add/Edit Comment for the activity.
In the window for entering general comments, select the General check box to filter comments in the existing comments list by the general type.
step.stepresult: All general comments appear in the existing comments list in the window for entering comments.

step.cmd: Select for an existing general comment.
Select Yes to complete the delete action.
step.stepresult: An informational message stating that the comment was successfully deleted appears in the Open page.

taskbody.result: The general comment is deleted for the activity.
